summary: A half-breed ex-Union gunfighter attempts to protect his plague-ridden hometown from being overridden by his racist half-brothers and a Confederate tyrant.
cast: Franco Nero|William Berger|Olga Karlatos|Orso Maria Guerrini|Gabriella Giacobbe|Antonio Marsina|Joshua Sinclair|Donald O'Brien|Leonardo Scavino|Wolfango Soldati|Victoria Zinny|Alfio Caltabiano|Woody Strode|Armando Bottin|Domenico Cianfriglia|Giovanni Cianfriglia|Pierangelo Civera|Roberto Dell'Acqua|Augusto Funari|Giglio Gigli|Roberto Messina|Riccardo Pizzuti|Angelo Ragusa|Sergio Ruggeri|Franco Ukmar|Sergio Ukmar|Massimo Vanni
keywords: half breed|cult film|spaghetti western|psychotronic film|gun battle
title: Keoma
